title: Market at record close, banks lift Sensex 387 pts, Nifty above 10,400 after WB ups India ranking
text: The broader markets underperformed benchmarks as the Nifty Midcap and Smallcap indices gained 0.55 percent each.

title: Market update: ICICI Bank hits new 52-week high, SBI, HUL top gainers, SCI zooms 10%
text: Shipping Corporation of India zoomed over 10 percent followed by Religare Enterprises, Syndicate Bank, MMTC and Hindustan Copper which were the top Sensex gainers.

title: Market update: 117 stocks hit fresh 52-week high on NSE, ICICI Bank top gainer, Axis most active
text: The top gainers from the Nifty were Bharti Airtel which zoomed close to 9 percent while ICICI Bank added 4.5 percent. The market breadth was strong with 1124 stocks advancing while 518 declined.

title: Market update: Bharti Airtel zooms over 7%, hits 52-week high, ICICI, SBI top gainers
text: Bank Nifty was the outshining sector with the index gaining 1.87 percent led by ICICI Bank which jumped 4.5 percent while State Bank of India and Punjab National bank were the other top gainers.

title: Closing Bell: Sensex, Nifty end at record closing high, banks push up indices
text: The Sensex was up 387.14 points at 33600.27, while the Nifty was up 105.20 points at 10440.50.

title: What changed for the market while you were sleeping? 20 things you should know
text: A look at top cues from domestic and international cues that could have a bearing on D-Street.

title: Market update: Axis Bank top Nifty gainer, NIIT Tech hits 52-week high, Tata Steel most active
text: Dalmia Bharat, HEG, Kalyani Invst, Vindhya Telelink, Birla Corp and NIIT Tech hits fresh 52-week high on the NSE while Axis Bank, Oil and Natural Gas Corporation, HCL Technologies and Dr Reddy#39;s Labs were the top Nifty gainers.

title: Market update: 89 stocks hit new 52-week high on NSE, Dr Reddy#39,s Labs top gainer
text: Religare Enterprises jumped 8.9 percent while Reliance Communications zoomed close to 8 percent on the BSE while Axis Bank, Dr Reddy#39;s Labs, Oil and Natural Gas Corporation and HCL Technologies were the top Nifty gainers.

title: Market update: Axis Bank, HCL Tech top Nifty gainers, RComm zooms over 11%
text: The top gainers in the Nifty50 were Axis Bank, followed by HCL Technologies, Power Grid, Ambuja Cements and Cipla while on the BSE, Reliance Communications, Wabco India, NIIT tech, GMR Infra and BF Utilities were the top gainers.

title: Closing Bell: Sensex, Nifty end session on a subdued note, Axis Bank gains big
text: Axis Bank and ONGC were the top gainers on both indices, while Infosys, MM, UPL and Vedanta were the top losers.

title: RIL, HDFC Bank help Sensex, Nifty end at fresh record closing high, Midcap outperforms
text: Yes Bank rebounded 2.5 percent, after 7 percent fall seen in previous session due to bad asset quality performance in Q2.

title: Market update: Tech Mahindra, Bharti Infratel top gainers, PNB jumps over 3%, SBI most active
text: The top Nifty gainers were Oil and Natural Gas Corporation, Yes Bank, Tech Mahindra, Bharti Infratel and Dr Reddy#39;s Labs while 1169 stocks advanced and 502 declined in the Nifty.

title: Market update: 95 stocks hit fresh 52-week high on NSE as midcaps outperform, Yes Bank top gainer
text: The Nifty midcap index continued to outperform the broader indices gaining 1.3 percent led by MRF, Bata India, Just Dial, IDBI Bank, Oriental Bank of Commerce and Voltas and the stocks which gained the most from the BSE included PI Industries which zoomed 8.5 percent and Jet Airways was up 6.71 percent.

title: Market update: Maruti hits new 52-week high, SBI, Jet Airways top gainers, ICICI most active
text: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation and Bharat Petroleum Corporation were the top gainers from Nifty which added over 3 percent each followed by State Bank of India which gained 2.59 percent while Oil and Natural Gas Corporation and Bharat Petroleum Corporation were the top gainers which added over 3 percent each followed by State Bank of India.

title: Closing Bell: Sensex, Nifty end at record closing high, HUL, ITC drag
text: Tata Motors DVR, Lupin, Bharti Infratel and Yes Bank gained the most on both indices, while HUL, ITC and HCL Technologies were the top losers.
